name: ghost-high-fiver

scripts.assets:optimize: for a in dist/*.png; do ./tools/tinypng.sh $a $a; done;
scripts.zip:create: pushd dist/ && zip -X -r game.zip index.html *.png *.svg *.bmp *.js && popd
scripts.zip: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm run build:terser && npm run assets:optimize && npm run zip:create && npm run zip:adv && npm run zip:measure
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && gh-pages -d dist/

//browserslist: Just to prevent parcel from causing babel to transpile anything and injecting regenerator runtime. Typescript already handles this.
